title: WTB: T206 w/Red Hindu Back PSA 1 or SGC 10

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 w/Red Hindu Back PSA 1 or SGC 10
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric
Looking to purchase a T206 common with a RED HINDU back in PSA 1, or SGC 10 condition.

I don't care that much about the front of the card, but I want a very presentable back.

If you have one for sale, please email me: crazylocomerk@yahoo.com

I can pay via PAYPAL, or I can send a check or MO.

Please email me with your asking price and a front/back scan. 

Thanks in advance.

Regards,
Eric
